meaningMnemonic: You know 事 means "occurrence," but it can also mean "matter." And if you <kanji>return</kanji> the <kanji>matter</kanji> to another person, you're giving a <vocabulary>reply</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>response</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
